most_active_tickets.title: Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again
Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus

common_issues.title: Pieces OS Errors and Bugs
common_issues.description: Users report various errors in Pieces OS, including virus flags by Kaspersky, empty message prompts, and issues with "Secret Message" example. Solutions involve software updates, restarting the application, and waiting for bug fixes from the Pieces team. Some issues persist and await resolution in future releases.

related_issues.title: Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
related_issues.text:
Kaspersky Internet Security flags Pieces OS as a virus
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

PiecesOS_11.2.2.0_x64

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/160ed12d-f0a1-46be-bf36-05502353405e)
## GitHub Issue Summary

**Author:** pieces-support-bot[bot]
**Date:** March 12, 2025
**Issue:** User @uwascan reported a problem with Pieces OS update.

**Key Points:**

* The issue has been automatically triaged and routed to the proper Pieces team member.
* The user might find related issues helpful for reference.
* The user is encouraged to check out existing issues, documentation, and YouTube channel for additional information.

**Problems Identified:**

* The user experienced an issue with updating Pieces OS.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* The issue will be investigated by the Pieces team.
* The user is provided with resources for further information.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is currently being investigated. There is no resolution yet.

**Important Note:**

This information is based on a limited excerpt of the conversation. For a complete understanding of the issue, please refer to the full conversation on GitHub.

related_issues.title: Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again
related_issues.text:
Pieces desktop this message is empty please try again
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

Pieces for Developers 4.0.2

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When copy paste code sencond time in Ask anything give error  this message is empty please try again
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Issue**: 
Users experiencing "This message is empty, please try again" error in Pieces desktop app.

**Key points raised**:
- Error occurs after updating to latest version.
- Affects Mac and Windows versions.
- Users cannot send second message in a new chat.

**Problems identified**:
- Patch released after initial report did not resolve the issue.

**Solutions proposed/implemented**:
- A new patch release was deployed to address the issue.

**Current status/outcome**:
- Issue should be fixed with the latest patch release.
- Mack (Pieces team member) will update the issue once the release is live. 

**Additional notes**:
- Affected users are advised to update to the latest version of Pieces.

related_issues.title: "Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
related_issues.text:
"Secret Message" Example doesn't work properly
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

When using LTM-2 to test the secret message example:
https://pieces.app/magic-moments/ltm

I got a strange response from the LLM:
Claude 3.5:
First Try:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1962a3e4-8b02-4d3f-bc8c-4bdd72c80aa6)
2. try: (waited longer on the website)
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cd71c5c1-d5d5-4449-acd5-e070fb244fa9)

Gemini 2.0 Flash did fail completely:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/50735f7a-28a1-4563-b490-e10c271eca23)
## Summary of GitHub Issue Conversation

**Key Points:**

* Several users reported encountering a "basic mode" error message in their PiecesOS app.
* This error prevented them from using the full functionality of the app, including Workstream Activity and LTM updates.
* The issue appears to be related to device constraints and a bug causing vector search to be disabled even on supported machines.
* Restarting PiecesOS temporarily resolves the issue.

**Problems Identified:**

* Users are unable to utilize all features of the app due to the "basic mode" error.
* Lack of clarity around "basic mode" and device constraints in documentation.
* Users are confused by the presence of an "Unknown Origin" element in the telemetry browser.

**Proposed/Implemented Solutions:**

* Restarting PiecesOS as a temporary fix.
* Mark-at-pieces will implement a permanent fix in the next PiecesOS version.
* Providing a clear explanation of "basic mode" and device constraints in the documentation.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue is temporarily resolved with a PiecesOS restart.
* A permanent fix is being developed for the next PiecesOS version.
* Documentation will be updated to clarify "basic mode" and device constraints.

**Additional Notes:**

* The "Unknown Origin" element in the telemetry browser is likely related to a previous installation of PiecesOS.
* Mark-at-pieces is available for further explanation and elaboration.

recommendations: **Prioritize bug fixes related to Pieces OS errors:** The data shows a high frequency of issues related to Pieces OS, including virus flags, empty message prompts, and problems with the "Secret Message" example. Addressing these bugs should be a top priority.

**Improve communication around known issues:**  Provide clear and concise information to users about the "This message is empty" error and the Kaspersky virus flag, including workarounds or expected resolution timelines.
**Review and update documentation:** The "Secret Message" example issue highlights the need for updated documentation. Ensure all examples and tutorials are accurate and functional.

**Investigate "basic mode" error:** Several users encountered a "basic mode" error impacting functionality. Investigate and address the bug causing this error, and clarify its meaning and device constraints in the documentation.

**Monitor and address issues with new releases:**  Be proactive in monitoring for new issues after updates or releases. The "This message is empty" error recurring after a patch highlights the need for thorough testing and faster response to regressions.
